titleStmt.title: The orthodox doctrine concerning iustification by faith asserted and vindicated: wherein the book of Mr. William Eyre, one of the ministers of New Sarum, is examined: and also the doctrine of Mr. Baxter concerning justification is discussed. / Written by John Eedes, minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Eedes, John, 1609?-1667?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Cripps and Lodowick Lloyd, and are to be sold at their shop in Popes-Head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
